description.en: Spend 3 Hope to temporarily Distract a target within Close range, giving them a -2 penalty to their Difficulty.
description.ru: Spend 3 Hope to temporarily Distract a target within Close range, giving them a -2 penalty to their Difficulty.

description.en: Describe how you rally the party and give yourself and each of your allies a Rally Die {{value}}. A PC can spend their Rally Die to roll it, adding the result to their action roll, reaction roll, damage roll, or to clear a number of Stress equal to the result. At the end of each session, clear all unspent Rally Dice.

description.en: After you make an action roll to impress, persuade, or offend someone, you can spend a Hope to add a d4 to the roll.

description.en: When you encourage an ally, you can do one of the following: 1) allow them to find a mundane object or tool they need, 2) help an Ally without spending Hope, 3) give them an additional downtime move during their next rest.

description.en: When you Help an Ally, you can narrate the moment as if you were writing the tale of their heroism in a memoir. When you do, roll a d10 as your advantage die.
